name: Novicell
overview:
Novicell is a Danish owned company based in Aarhus. Our core competencies include consulting and solutions in online based marketing and applications for improving business processes.

Novicell offers integrated solutions, but all of our products can also be used as stand-alone applications that easily integrate into your existing IT platforms.

Besides that our online marketing department helps with SEO, AdWords, webanalytics and other.

The starting point for our products and solutions are always the functionality and benefits. Our IT solutions to help our clients achieve the business objectives set for the company.

Novicell has existed for 14 years with continuous positive accounts, and currently employs 46 staff, most of which are developers. Novicell company is technically registered respectively Novicell IT ApS and Novicell Internet ApS.
